TopicTitle: mechjeb available only when pilot present?

Articles.Content:
Can anyone think of a way to use module manager to allow mechjeb to be available only when a pilot is in a pod? I know how to add mechjebcore to command pods. What I'm interested in is having MJ usable only when a pilot is in that command pod (somehow picking up on the ModuleCommand "requiresPilot" flag)

Edited September 9, 2017 by seanth

I don't understand why? Mechjeb is a computer... it should be available for probes and such. That is, if you use MechJeb...

Edited September 9, 2017 by TheKurgan
